title: Pregnancy Tracker, Maternity
description:
In advance, let's track your pregnancy period to understand and track your time efficiently with Pregnancy Tracker, Maternity App.

Pregnancy Tracker app will help you to track your process regularly. In weeks you can learn knowledge about your baby and yourself. Even you will be acquired knowledge about valuable tips and info about pregnancy.

We have developed this best and free app not just for women but also for men. Because, besides women, men also need to know information about pregnancy and baby. 

Pregnancy Tracker will guide you through your period. Easily track your progress with great design and magnificent features.

Besides Pregnancy Tracking, there is a to-do list that every mother should do. You can check the list and after everything is done, you can click it and make it completed easily. Moreover, it is free.

Count your baby's kick with the phone's remarkable speed and record it without delay. Kick counter is an easy tool to understand and carry out. From now on, you won't forget which time your baby had kicked you.

Weight Tracker is the main necessity of the pregnancy cycle. Now, you can track your weight within a daily period. The free weight tracking tool will guide you to understand your weight for your next pregnancy.

A contraction timer is a demanding tool for every pregnant woman. If you use it wisely you can time your contractions with amazing accuracy. Every interval will be counted and added to your pregnancy diary. This is the best way to track your pregnancy period.

Family photo albums are great tools for remembering all the remarkable memories. In our free app, you can take magnificent photos with your family and add them to your album. 

Besides family photos, you can take your belly photo to remember what your body looks like :) Pregnancy Tracker, Maternity App is providing it to you.
 
Baby Heartbeat Monitor is the main important tool for listening to your baby's heart rate in your womb. every mother's dream is to listen to their child's heartbeat before her child was born. You can do it by downloading our free app.

Listening to your baby's heartbeat is never easy before. Just put your phone's mic on your belly and let your phone record your baby's heartbeat. But if there are too many noises around, you may not hear your baby's heartbeat. We recommend going to a doctor if there is a health problem with yourself. We just let you record your baby's heart rate, but we can not provide anything more.

Besides your baby's heartbeat, you can monitor your own pulse. But as a consideration, you shouldn't do this feature for medical purposes. 

The heartrate Monitor feature will let you measure your pulse within 10 seconds. For 10 seconds you must put your finger on the phone's camera zone. After that, you will see your pulse clearly. But sometimes like all technological devices, there couldn't be an exact and correct result. Therefore we recommend going to a doctor if there is a health problem with yourself.

Most importantly you can add your ultrasound photos of your child. After years later, they can see their unborn photos. Maybe they would like to add their ultrasound photos to their social media accounts if there will be any of them still available.

DISCLAIMER: There may not be a guaranteed result for each test. We don't recommend using it for health issues. If you are having a serious health problem please see a doctor.

Download Pregnancy Tracker, Maternity App to track your progress efficiently...We wish you the best and healthy pregnancy:)

summary: Track your pregnancy, kick & contraction counter, baby & mom's heartrate monitor
